articles.author: Sugata Ghosh and Nishanth Vasudevan
articles.title: Sebi mulls stock payment system bypassing brokers - The Economic Times
articles.description: At present, such a system exists in the 'primary' or IPO market. Sebi is exploring bringing the 'fund-blocking mechanism' to the secondary stock market. Known as ASBA or Application Supported by Blocked Amount, this method is mandatory for investing in initia…
articles.content: Mumbai: The Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) is considering an ambitious plan to alter the payment mechanism in stock market trades. The markets regulator is discussing with market infra… [+4334 chars]
